attributes.action: Force Microsoft to Reintroduct the Right-Click Autocorrect Feature in Office 2013!
attributes.additional_details: Foe some reason, Mictrosoft have removed the right-click autocorrect feature from their Office 2013 package.  The reason they gave was, "to save clutter"!  This is ludicrous and the whole online community are demanding that they re-add it.  It was the best thing about Microsoft Office!  Please sign this if you want it bacnk, now!
